title: Build tank or not worth anymore?
body:
With the new patch, I found basically the amount of damage you receive is nuts, sometimes within a second and you are dead. Tried playing alistair building just tank, still doesn't last that much longer, is it still worth building tanks? or is it all about exploding the enemy nowadays? and the new patch basically shrunk many games down because often the game is set within the first 15 minutes with basically no way of comebacks as it used to.
What is the general tactics nowadays?

replies.body:
Tanks still can be a major influence in team fights. Champions like {{champion:36}}, {{champion:32}}, {{champion:86}} are all a** HUGE PAIN** if they build tank _**PROPERLY**_! But sometimes they too can be cut down with items such as {{item:3153}} due to it passive and {{item:3036}}. Combine these items with ATK SPD items such as {{item:3087}}, {{item:3094}} then you can easily cut down tanks...

But if you keep an eye out for these and take them down ASAP then the fight is in your favour!

Agree... They should just delete the tank champions altogether, what's the point?
Just played a game against a Talon without his full gear, basically killed everyone with 3 buttons within a second. A real live walking fountain roaming. NOT EVEN FULL GEAR and nowhere as farmed as the player on our team lanning against him. GJ riot I'm just going to play candy crush lol
I like candy crush good game

Very few tanks can come back from being pushed behind. Because you will still get shredded. 

Late game, you will still get shredded because % penetration is stupid. That said, if you are taking the hits instead of your damage dealers, you're doing your job.

Yea I understand if you act as a good meat shield you will do well, but nowadays, against a full team of damage dealers/cc, you only buy your adc like 1 second at most, and honestly, who wants to play as a meat shield that last a bare second?

the thing is, its only bonus armour penetration so it isnt as bad as the old last whisper but thats ironic because lord dominiks is actually so strong against tanky champs with stacked hp, since you become a better vayne. but tanks are still capable to turning fights when you  utilise your skillset and prioritise like Alistar when he combos and throws down his ulti tanking the duration given.
